price: (Nkͻmhyεni), nokorε sε wͻn a (wͻgyina) mfikyire (tea mu) frε woͻ no, wͻn mu bebree nni adwen.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُنَادُونَكَ مِن وَرَآءِ ٱلۡحُجُرَٰتِ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna yunādūnaka min warāi al-ḥujurāti aktharuhum lā yaʿqilūna
